text: Giuseppe Turini (10 March 1927 – 21 February 2018) was an Italian politician. Born in San Miniato in 1927, he represented Grosseto in the Senate between 1992 and 2001, first as a member of the Italian Social Movement and later the National Alliance. He died at the age of 90 on 21 February 2018, at a hospital in Massa Marittima. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2018 deaths Category:People from San Miniato Category:Italian Social Movement politicians Category:National Alliance (Italy) politicians Category:Senators of Legislature XI of Italy Category:Senators of Legislature XII of Italy Category:Senators of Legislature XIII of Italy Category:Politicians of Tuscany
title: Giuseppe Turini
